name: Digital Course + Physical Workbook Form
description: A form for purchasing digital courses with optional physical workbooks

data.title: Digital Course + Physical Workbook
data.description: Enroll in our digital courses and optionally add a physical workbook to enhance your learning experience. Select your preferred course, choose workbook options if desired, and provide your details for digital access and physical delivery.

fields.label: Course Start Date
fields.options: Next Available Session, Custom Start Date

fields.label: Study Group Preference
fields.options: Morning Group (9AM-12PM), Afternoon Group (1PM-4PM), Evening Group (6PM-9PM), Self-Paced
